LanguageData.DSFI_TT_ConfigWanderMultiplier: Multiplier for wandering instead of doing something. If you lower it, colonists try more somethings.
LanguageData.DSFI_TT_SpendingTimeMultiplier: Multiplier for time about to do something. If you lower it, colonists uses more time for idle. If you have a lot of colonist in settlement, it is recommended to raise this option.
